title: YouTube : all-time beauty content category views 2017
yAxis: Amount of category views in billions
summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Selected Cosmetics, and Amount of category views in billions in each Selected Cosmetics on the y axis.
The maximum Amount of category views in billions 219.0 is found at Selected Cosmetics Beauty - overall and the minimum is found at Nails where Selected Cosmetics is 4.0.
The minimum Selected Cosmetics Nails has got 54.75 times less Amount of category views in billions than the maximum Selected Cosmetics Beauty - overall.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Selected Cosmetics in the x axis and Amount of category views in billions in the y axis.
The Amount of category views in billions is appeared to be the highest at Selected Cosmetics Beauty - overall and lowest at Selected Cosmetics Nails.
Second maximum Amount of category views in billions is found at Selected Cosmetics Cosmetics.
There is a difference of 215.0 between the maximum Selected Cosmetics Beauty - overall and minimum Selected Cosmetics Nails.
The Selected Cosmetics Beauty - overall has the highest Amount of category views in billions, followed by Cosmetics, and Hair. Down to the Selected Cosmetics Nails which is the lowest.
The highest value 219.0 at Beauty - overall is almost 3.16 times larger than the average value 69.33.
Summing up the values of all Selected Cosmeticss, we get total 624.0.
